features: 【Ergonomic Gaming Keyboard】: Scientific stair-up keycaps design brings maximum comfort, keeping your hand in a most natural state to minimize hand fatigue after longtime use. Two level adjustable feet and inclined bottom frame provides a great ergonomic support for long lasting typing comfort.
【TKL Mechanical Keyboard】: This compact layout keyboard with 87 keys. Concentrated all the key functions you need in minimalist design. Save more space for your mouse moving and neat the desktop.

【Yellow Switch Gaming Keyboards】: Camiysn SKY87 mechanical keyboard linear yellow switches provide extra smoothness and soft gripping as you will feel very light and smooth while typing, and as silent as red switches, ideal for gaming community, office workers, and central apartments.

【Retro and Aesthetics Design】: The keycaps adopt classic black and retro white, match extra 16 red color keycaps, embellishing your desktop style with different colors, allowing you to experience games and office while also feeling the quality and texture of art.

【Full Anti-ghosting Keyboard】: 100% anti-ghosting gaming keyboard allows all keys to work simultaneously with high speed for a reliable connection, have 12 multimedia keyboard, great for gamer, typist, programmer, writer etc.
【Extensive Compatibility】: Camiysn 80% mechanical keyboard compatible with Windows (2000, XP, ME, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11), Linux and Mac, plug and play, no drivers or software required.
【Note】: If you have any question or problems in use or quality, please feel free to contact us, We will response you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard works good
reviews.reviewText: The first one of these I received was defective. The second one works great and I have not had any issues with it. The keys all work, nothing sticks. Everything is smooth and accurate. I like that you can change out the caps with different colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THIS
reviews.reviewText: I literally have ordered 3 of these and all of them came with defects. With the first one the tab key was broken. With the second one it didn't even light up or function at all. With the third one all the keys came removed, and the F1 F2 and F3 keys didnt work along with the O key. DO NOT BUY THIS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars pretty good, but a little expensive
reviews.reviewText: 30+ USD is a little steep for what the product is but after using it for a couple games and transcribing an essay or two its an okay product that lacks a few creature comforts. Like having the the little notches on the F and J key caps is kind of a weird feeling when almost all of the keyboards that I had used in the past has had the little nubs so that I could easily orientate myself on the keyboard without looking down at the thing,. but its not that big of a problem. And the second creature comfort that id like to have on the keyboard is the keys being translucent where the print of the key letter is so that I dont have to keep a small light near me to quickly glance at the keyboard to see where my finger is resting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very compact and workable
reviews.reviewText: I have never used the right hand number pad on the larger keyboards. This keyboard does away with that but keeps the "Del" key for system booting.The keyboard has a good feel to it. I've turned off the lighting. The only possible improvement for my use would be the addition of a "Home" key. I just have to get used to its absence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unable to move forward with this keyboard.
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe the home keys "F" and "J" not have any tactile bumps on them to align your hands without looking at the keyboard. This is a horrible omission and makes this product useless to me. Maybe some of you won't care, but as a touch typist this is unacceptable. There are some replacement keycaps, but the red ones are for specific keys and don't address that issue. I would strongly suggest they add F and J keys with tactile bump on them for touch typists.The lighting effects on this keyboard are impressive (although a little more brightness would be appreciated). There are many lighting patterns to choose from but the manual was not clear on how to change them. Pressing FN+ 0...9 goes through one set and then FN+[PrtScrn] has a different set. The FN + arrow left/right didn't really do anything as the manual suggested. And I could see no "APP" key on the keyboard.Sadly for me, on the first item I received the "W" key was unresponsive, working maybe 1 in 20 presses. I returned/replaced and received a second item and all functions work as expected. Even working as designed, I don't think I would want to use this product on a daily basis the feel / travel / sound of the keys was not pleasant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality gaming keyboardAwesome gift very smooth keysVery easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars with my favorite switches this quickly took over my work desk
reviews.reviewText: so yellow switches are some of my favorites and this one is no different this keyboard felt good and worked well my only complaint was the no detachable wire and the wire location it's kind of inconvient on a gamers desk specially if you have more than one keyboard for dual pc set up otherwise this keyboard isn't bat at all and i rather enjoyed working and gaming on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too many issues, so many better choices.
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard has issues that make it a very bad purchase. Due to poor molding of the keycaps there is little or no way to view the inconsistent, tiny and thin key nomenclature in low ambient light. There is nothing that can be done short of replacing all of the key caps. This is not an RGB keyboard! There is no illumination through the key caps, only under the key. To complicate the use of this keyboard, the instructions are terrible, at best. There are a lot of useless safety references, company information and very little about the functionality of the keyboard that customers really need to know.

I was specifically looking for proper font on the keys. The font on the keyboard does not correspond to the image in the product description (see photo). Returning.These are yellow (almost indistinguishable from the quietest red) keys.
